xt:extension.xt:author: Dartmouth College Library
xt:extension.xt:name: MODS (Metadata Object Description Schema)

xt:description.p: The Dartmouth College Library's local implementation of MODS, the Metadata Object Description Schema.

ul.li: "MODS-to-MARCXML" transformation enhanced to better support OCLC operations, including creation of MARC 880 field based on @script.
Transformations now place the output files in the same directory as the input files, instead of the project's home directory.
Schematron and XML Schema files updated to reflect latest local implementation practices.
CSS now better displays attribute names and values.
